channel.title: Error connecting to server . must be down click"cancel" then start server etc
channel.description:
:mad: help !!! i always get this whenever i try to log into any server!!!!
error connecting to server . must be down click"cancel" then start server etc..
wdf is this?!?!? how do i get this to work!!!!!! i have java and moparscape 3.1 downloaded so now what?!?!?
anything else i need to download?? :mad: :confused:
______________________________________________________________ anybody know???[br][size=1]Posted at: October 12, 2006, 09:06:32 AM[/size][hr]does anybody know?!?!?
